This<S>2088</S> is the book<S>5612</S> of the generations<S>8435</S> of Adam<S>121</S>. In the day<S>3117</S> that God<S>430</S> created<S>1254</S> man<S>120</S>, in the likeness<S>1823</S> of God<S>430</S> made<S>6213</S> he him;
Male<S>2145</S> and female<S>5347</S> created<S>1254</S> he them; and blessed<S>1288</S> them, and called<S>7121</S> their name<S>8034</S> Adam<S>120</S>, in the day<S>3117</S> when they were created<S>1254</S>.
And Adam<S>121</S> lived<S>2421</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> a son in his own likeness<S>1823</S>, after his image<S>6754</S>; and called<S>7121</S> his name<S>8034</S> Seth<S>8352</S>:
And the days<S>3117</S> of Adam<S>121</S> after<S>310</S> he had begotten<S>3205</S> Seth<S>8352</S> were eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> that Adam<S>121</S> lived<S>2425</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Seth<S>8352</S> lived<S>2421</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Enos<S>583</S>: <sup>Enos: Heb. Enosh</sup>
And Seth<S>8352</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Enos<S>583</S> eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Seth<S>8352</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and twelve<S>6240</S> <S>8147</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Enos<S>583</S> lived<S>2421</S> ninety<S>8673</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Cainan<S>7018</S>: <sup>Cainan: Heb. Kenan</sup>
And Enos<S>583</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Cainan<S>7018</S> eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and fifteen<S>6240</S> <S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Enos<S>583</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Cainan<S>7018</S> lived<S>2421</S> seventy<S>7657</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Mahalaleel<S>4111</S>: <sup>Mahalaleel: Gr. Maleleel</sup>
And Cainan<S>7018</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Mahalaleel<S>4111</S> eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and forty<S>705</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Cainan<S>7018</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and ten<S>6235</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Mahalaleel<S>4111</S> lived<S>2421</S> sixty<S>8346</S> <S>8141</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Jared<S>3382</S>: <sup>Jared: Heb. Jered</sup>
And Mahalaleel<S>4111</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Jared<S>3382</S> eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> and thirty<S>7970</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Mahalaleel<S>4111</S> were eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> ninety<S>8673</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Jared<S>3382</S> lived<S>2421</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> sixty<S>8346</S> <S>8141</S> and two<S>8147</S> years<S>8141</S>, and he begat<S>3205</S> Enoch<S>2585</S>:
And Jared<S>3382</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Enoch<S>2585</S> eight<S>8083</S> hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Jared<S>3382</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> sixty<S>8346</S> and two<S>8147</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Enoch<S>2585</S> lived<S>2421</S> sixty<S>8346</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Methuselah<S>4968</S>: <sup>Methuselah: Gr. Mathusala</sup>
And Enoch<S>2585</S> walked<S>1980</S> with<S>854</S> God<S>430</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> <S>853</S> Methuselah<S>4968</S> three<S>7969</S> hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Enoch<S>2585</S> were three<S>7969</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> sixty<S>8346</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>:
And Enoch<S>2585</S> walked<S>1980</S> with God<S>430</S>: and he was not; for God<S>430</S> took<S>3947</S> him.
And Methuselah<S>4968</S> lived<S>2421</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> eighty<S>8084</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> Lamech<S>3929</S>:
And Methuselah<S>4968</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Lamech<S>3929</S> seven<S>7651</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> eighty<S>8084</S> and two<S>8147</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>: <sup>Lamech: Heb. Lemech</sup>
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Methuselah<S>4968</S> were nine<S>8672</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> sixty<S>8346</S> and nine<S>8672</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Lamech<S>3929</S> lived<S>2421</S> an hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> eighty<S>8084</S> and two<S>8147</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> a son<S>1121</S>:
And he called<S>7121</S> his name<S>8034</S> Noah<S>5146</S>, saying<S>559</S>, This same shall comfort<S>5162</S> us concerning our work<S>4639</S> and toil<S>6093</S> of our hands<S>3027</S>, because<S>4480</S> of the ground<S>127</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> hath cursed<S>779</S>. <sup>Noah: Gr. Noe: that is Rest, or, Comfort</sup>
And Lamech<S>3929</S> lived<S>2421</S> after<S>310</S> he begat<S>3205</S> Noah<S>5146</S> five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> ninety<S>8673</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S>, and begat<S>3205</S> sons<S>1121</S> and daughters<S>1323</S>:
And all the days<S>3117</S> of Lamech<S>3929</S> were seven<S>7651</S> hundred<S>3967</S> <S>8141</S> seventy<S>7657</S> and seven<S>7651</S> years<S>8141</S>: and he died<S>4191</S>.
And Noah<S>5146</S> was five<S>2568</S> hundred<S>3967</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>: and Noah<S>5146</S> begat<S>3205</S> Shem<S>8035</S>, Ham<S>2526</S>, and Japheth<S>3315</S>.
